column1: Table 3-43:  Approach 2 Quantitative Uncertainty Estimates for CH4 and CO2 Emissions from Petroleum Systems (MMT CO2 Eq. and Percent)

column5: Uncertainty Range Relative to Emission Estimatea

column2: a Range of emission estimates estimated by applying the 95 percent confidence intervals obtained from the Monte Carlo Simulation analysis conducted for the year 2017 CH4 emissions.
b All reported values are rounded after calculation. As a result, lower and upper bounds may not be duplicable from other rounded values as shown in table.

c An uncertainty analysis for the petroleum systems CO2 emissions was not performed. The relative uncertainty estimated (expressed as a percent) from the CH4 uncertainty analysis was applied to the point estimate of petroleum systems CO2 emissions.
